## Welcome to the Austin ML Journal Club

We are a community of ML/AI practitioners who meet monthly to deeply engage with seminal research. Our posts capture the insights and critical perspectives that emerge when practitioners move beyond surface-level summaries to examine how the sausages actually get made.
